# PR Summary

Remove the 32,767 character limit on the environment block for `Start-Process`
fixes #14110

## PR Context

This limit only applied to Windows XP/Server 2003 - newer versions of Windows have no limitation ([source](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-gb/windows/win32/procthread/environment-variables))

comments.author: MattJeanes
comments.body: This pull request indirectly fixes a accidental breaking change in PowerShell 7.0 -> 7.1 which affects most notably Azure DevOps pipelines with many artifacts - is this going to make it into a patch release soon? We're having to add work arounds to our code now for the linked issue as Azure Pipelines agents have updated to PowerShell 7.1.
